resources.string: This app describes Who I am, What I have done and what I have been looking for! I let this app stay open source so that anybody can use it for free! Source is freely available at\nhttps://github.com/cyph3rcod3r/resume.git

A big thanks to Android for their design support library and making me do something in my life!
